name: Marvellous and magic MCU inventions
description: In Thor: Love and Thunder, the iconic weapons Mjölnir and Stormbreaker are joined by new additions like Zeu's Thunderbolt - they're just a long line of enchanted and technologically advanced weapons in movies.

key_work.title: Mighty Thor costume and Mjölnir
key_work.brief_description: When it came to the Mighty Thor (Natalie Portman), costume designer Mayes C Rubeo decided to go old school, recreating the classic Thor costume and the vintage feel of the old comic books.

video_links.name: Captain America: The First Avenger - Trailer
Captain America: The First Avenger Trailer 2

start.brief_description: During World War II, Steve Rogers is a sickly man from Brooklyn who’s transformed into super-soldier Captain America to aid in the war effort.

constellations_other.name: Marvellous and magic MCU inventions
constellations_other.description: In Thor: Love and Thunder, the iconic weapons Mjölnir and Stormbreaker are joined by new additions like Zeu's Thunderbolt - they're just a long line of enchanted and technologically advanced weapons in movies.

end.title: What If...?
end.creator_credit: David J. Grant, Carrie Wassenaar, Blue Spirit, Flying Bark Productions, Marvel Studios, Squeeze, Stellar Creative Lab and Paul Lasaine
end.brief_description: Taking inspiration from the comic books of the same name, each episode explores a pivotal moment from the Marvel Cinematic Universe and turns it on its head, leading the audience into uncharted territory.

constellations_other.name: Marvellous and magic MCU inventions
constellations_other.description: In Thor: Love and Thunder, the iconic weapons Mjölnir and Stormbreaker are joined by new additions like Zeu's Thunderbolt - they're just a long line of enchanted and technologically advanced weapons in movies.

links.description: The Disney + series What If presents alternative versions of Marvel Studios’ biggest characters. In one stream of the Multiverse, Peggy Carter wielded the famous shield (with a Union Jack instead of stars and stripes) as Captain Carter.

start.title: What If...?
start.creator_credit: David J. Grant, Carrie Wassenaar, Blue Spirit, Flying Bark Productions, Marvel Studios, Squeeze, Stellar Creative Lab and Paul Lasaine
start.brief_description: Taking inspiration from the comic books of the same name, each episode explores a pivotal moment from the Marvel Cinematic Universe and turns it on its head, leading the audience into uncharted territory.

constellations_other.description: In Thor: Love and Thunder, the iconic weapons Mjölnir and Stormbreaker are joined by new additions like Zeu's Thunderbolt - they're just a long line of enchanted and technologically advanced weapons in movies.

end.title: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
end.creator_credit: Sam Raimi, Graham Churchyard, Kevin Feige, Kevin Feige Productions, Marvel Studios, Charles Wood, Russell Hopwood and Michael Waldron
end.brief_description: Doctor Strange, with the help of mystical allies both old and new, traverses the mind-bending and dangerous alternate realities of the Multiverse to confront a mysterious new adversary.

constellations_other.name: Marvellous and magic MCU inventions
constellations_other.description: In Thor: Love and Thunder, the iconic weapons Mjölnir and Stormbreaker are joined by new additions like Zeu's Thunderbolt - they're just a long line of enchanted and technologically advanced weapons in movies.

links.description: The live action version of Captain Carter appeared in Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness, directed by Sam Raimi. The film features other famous objects and devices, including the Dark Hold magic book and Dr Strange’s magical Sling Ring.

start.title: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
start.creator_credit: Sam Raimi, Graham Churchyard, Kevin Feige, Kevin Feige Productions, Marvel Studios, Charles Wood, Russell Hopwood and Michael Waldron
start.brief_description: Doctor Strange, with the help of mystical allies both old and new, traverses the mind-bending and dangerous alternate realities of the Multiverse to confront a mysterious new adversary.

end.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
end.creator_credit: Jon Watts, Sanja Milković Hays, Amy Pascal, Kevin Feige, Columbia Pictures, Marvel Studios, Pascal Pictures, Darren Gilford, Chris McKenna and Erik Sommers
end.brief_description: Peter Parker is unmasked and no longer able to separate his normal life from the high-stakes of being a super-hero. When he asks for help from Doctor Strange the stakes become even more dangerous.

constellations_other.name: Marvellous and magic MCU inventions
constellations_other.description: In Thor: Love and Thunder, the iconic weapons Mjölnir and Stormbreaker are joined by new additions like Zeu's Thunderbolt - they're just a long line of enchanted and technologically advanced weapons in movies.

links.description: Sam Raimi is no stranger to Marvel, having directed the original Spider-Man trilogy starring Tobey Maguire. Maguire’s Spider-Man appears in Spider-Man: No Way Home after Ned uses Dr Strange’s Sling Ring.

start.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
start.creator_credit: Jon Watts, Sanja Milković Hays, Amy Pascal, Kevin Feige, Columbia Pictures, Marvel Studios, Pascal Pictures, Darren Gilford, Chris McKenna and Erik Sommers

end.title: Iron Man
end.creator_credit: Jon Favreau, Laura Jean Shannon, Rebecca Gregg, Avi Arad, Kevin Feige, Marvel Studios, J. Michael Riva, Art Marcum, Hawk Ostby, Mark Fergus, Matt Holloway and Andy Hass
end.brief_description: After being held captive in an Afghan cave, billionaire engineer Tony Stark creates a unique weaponised suit of armor to fight evil.

constellations_other.description: In Thor: Love and Thunder, the iconic weapons Mjölnir and Stormbreaker are joined by new additions like Zeu's Thunderbolt - they're just a long line of enchanted and technologically advanced weapons in movies.

links.description: The MCU version of Spider-Man is given a technologically advanced suit by Tony Stark, aka Iron Man, in Captain America: Civil War. The first Iron Man not only kicked off the MCU, but a key scene showed Stark building the first iconic Marvel instrument.

start.title: Iron Man

links.description: Though it’s first wielded in Captain America: The First Avenger, a prototype of Captain America’s shield first appears in Tony Stark’s workshop in Iron Man.

end.title: Avengers: Endgame
end.creator_credit: Anthony Russo, Joe Russo, Christopher Markus, Stephen McFeely, Joseph Richard Collins, Judianna Makovsky, Myra N. Foy, Heather Armstrong, Kevin Feige, Marvel Studios, Charles Wood, Bailey Eller, Ben Cowell-Thomas, Joe Howes, Kristine Nadal, Louise Aubertin and Tommy Barry
end.brief_description: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War, the universe is in ruins due to the efforts of the Mad Titan, Thanos. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers must assemble once more in order to undo Thanos’ actions and restore order to the universe once and for all, no matter what consequences may be in store.

constellations_other.name: Easter Eggs on screen
constellations_other.description: People have been slipping secrets into films, games and television for as long as they have existed.

constellations_other.name: Marvellous and magic MCU inventions
constellations_other.description: In Thor: Love and Thunder, the iconic weapons Mjölnir and Stormbreaker are joined by new additions like Zeu's Thunderbolt - they're just a long line of enchanted and technologically advanced weapons in movies.

links.description: In Thor: Love and Thunder, Thor is reunited not only with his ex-girlfriend Jane Foster, but also his ‘old friend’ the hammer Mjölnir. While estranged from Mjölnir, Thor has been wielding Stormbreaker since crafting it in Avengers: End Game.

start.title: Avengers: Endgame
start.creator_credit: Anthony Russo, Joe Russo, Christopher Markus, Stephen McFeely, Joseph Richard Collins, Judianna Makovsky, Myra N. Foy, Heather Armstrong, Kevin Feige, Marvel Studios, Charles Wood, Bailey Eller, Ben Cowell-Thomas, Joe Howes, Kristine Nadal, Louise Aubertin and Tommy Barry
start.brief_description: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War, the universe is in ruins due to the efforts of the Mad Titan, Thanos. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers must assemble once more in order to undo Thanos’ actions and restore order to the universe once and for all, no matter what consequences may be in store.

constellations_other.name: Marvellous and magic MCU inventions
constellations_other.description: In Thor: Love and Thunder, the iconic weapons Mjölnir and Stormbreaker are joined by new additions like Zeu's Thunderbolt - they're just a long line of enchanted and technologically advanced weapons in movies.

links.description: The Marvel Cinematic Universe is full of fantastical devices, weapons and instruments. One of the most famous is Captain America’s star-spangled shield, which was first used by the first avenger in Captain America: The First Avenger.

start.title: Mighty Thor costume and Mjölnir
start.brief_description: When it came to the Mighty Thor (Natalie Portman), costume designer Mayes C Rubeo decided to go old school, recreating the classic Thor costume and the vintage feel of the old comic books.

constellations_primary.name: Marvellous and magic MCU inventions
constellations_primary.description: In Thor: Love and Thunder, the iconic weapons Mjölnir and Stormbreaker are joined by new additions like Zeu's Thunderbolt - they're just a long line of enchanted and technologically advanced weapons in movies.

end.title: Thor: Love and Thunder
end.brief_description: Thor: Love and Thunder sees Thor (Chris Hemsworth) embark on a journey of self-discovery – which is suddenly interrupted by a galactic killer, Gorr the God Butcher (Christian Bale), who seeks to eliminate the gods.

constellations_other.name: Marvellous and magic MCU inventions
constellations_other.description: In Thor: Love and Thunder, the iconic weapons Mjölnir and Stormbreaker are joined by new additions like Zeu's Thunderbolt - they're just a long line of enchanted and technologically advanced weapons in movies.

constellations_other.name: Physical transformation and the formation of character
constellations_other.description: Christian Bale is hardly recogniseable as villain Gorr the God Butcher in Thor: Love and Thunder. It’s just another instance of the actor drastically changing his appearance to inhabit a character – and he’s not the only one.

constellations_other.name: Mayes C Rubeo
constellations_other.description: Emmy-award winning and Oscar-nominated costume designer Mayes C Rubeo has worked on some of Hollywood's biggest blockbusters, designing costumes for characters and creatures across time, space and everything in between.

links.description: Thor: Love and Thunder sees Natalie Portman return to the Thor franchise as astrophysicist Jane Foster, who guides Thor on his journey to find himself by rekindling the romance between them.
